questions.text: Explain the difference between REST and GraphQL. When would you choose one over the other?
How do you handle database migrations in a production environment?
Explain the concept of database indexing. When would you add an index?
How do you implement caching in a distributed system?
Explain the concept of rate limiting. How would you implement it?
How do you handle authentication and authorization in a microservices architecture?
Explain the concept of eventual consistency. When is it acceptable?
How do you monitor and debug performance issues in a production environment?
Explain the concept of idempotency in API design. Why is it important?
How do you handle data validation in your APIs?
Explain the concept of database transactions. When would you use them?
How do you implement error handling in a distributed system?
